name: Universal Travel Adapter, International Travel Plug Adapter with 2 USB-C ＆ 2 USB-A Ports, with Extra 2 Prong AC Outlet All in One Portable Socket, for USA, UK, EU, AU ＆ 224+ Countries (Black)
short_description: [Worldwide Compatibility] decqle universal travel adapter is designed with 4 interchangeable plugs which meet international plug standard: 1.Type C(most of the Europe) 2.Type G(such as UK, Ireland, Singapore) 3.Type A(such as America, Canada, Mexico) 4.Type I(such as China, Australia, New Zealand). It can cover 224+ countrires plug standards. *Note: NOT for Type D (mostly used in India), Type M (mostly used in South Africa) and Korea.

[Double AC Sockets] The socket has 2500W max AC power and input voltage: 100-250V(innovatively added an US socket on the side), it's compatible with various high power devices. *Note: This adapter dose NOT have convert function, please make sure that your appliance supports dual voltage (with"100-250V,50/60Hz" printed on it).

[4 Additional Interfaces] The adapter has 2 USB-C ports(single 15W) and 2 USB-A(single 12W) port, extra 2 Prong AC Outlet，with a total 17W max output. So it could work as a regular charger for your phone or watch. The intelligent chip can automatically distribute power when multiple appliances are in use simultaneously, protects your devices even though charging the whole night.

[Updated Smaller Size] This adapter is 15% smaller compared to most products of the same power on the market. And it’s easy to release or retract the plug by one hand. After you retract the pins, the adapter could be pack as small cube(size: 6.4*5.5*5.4cm, weigh: 135g). The hard external PC case can protect the device inside in case of dropping.

[Higher Safety Standards] The adapter has 2 international standard 10A fuses(one is replacement), which is available as spare parts from stores worldwide; Updated “Automatic Locking System” could prevent electric shock; Ø4.0 + Ø4.82 european standard socket independent design; The fireproof external PC case can withstand a 750°C fire; more protection etc.

name: EPICKA Universal Travel Adapter, GaN International Plug Adapter with 3 USB-C 70W PD Fast Charging & 2 USB-A Adaptor All-in-one Wall Charger for USA EU UK AUS (TA-105 Pro, Black)
short_description: WORLDWIDE ADAPTER - Our all-in-one adapter is equipped with 4 different plug types that could plug into the sockets of 200+ countries and regions: Type C (most popular type) for use in most of Europe, including France, Germany, Italy, Spain, Iceland, Greece, and many other countries; Type G for UK, Ireland, HK, Malaysia, Singapore; Type I for China, Australia, New Zealand, Argentina; Type A for USA, Mexico, Canada, and Japan. It does NOT work with Type D (India) or Type M (South Africa) sockets.

6 IN 1 WITH 70W FAST CHARGING - Charge multiple USB devices simultaneously at high speed through 3 USB-C port (3A) and 2 USB-A ports (2.4A).The USB-C1 port supports PD3.0 and offer up to 70W fast charging. Ideal for tablet, USB powered laptop, Smartphones, smart watch and fitness tracker, tablet, power bank, camera, handheld game console, headsets, and everything else that is charged through a USB port.

VERSATILE AC OUTLET - Accept not only US plugs, but also various plugs from EU countries, UK, AU and China. Note: Our adapter does NOT convert voltage (US/Canada: 110-120V, most other countries: 220-230V), ensure the AC-powered device intended to use abroad supports dual voltage (the input spec reads “100-240V, 50/60Hz” on it). For electric toothbrush, shaver/trimmer, water flosser, garment steamer, hair straightener, CPAP machine, it is critical to check the specs before your trip.

ABOUT HIGH-POWER APPLIANCES OVER 2000W - Many hair dryers, irons and electric kettles fall into this category. Even if they support dual voltage, it is still NOT recommended to use them in a country with different voltage due to potential hazards (the built-in 10A fuse might pop to prevent further damage). Many manufacturers do NOT make dual voltage high-power devices (for a reason), and NO portable voltage converters can handle such high-power safely over an extended time.

PORTABLE AND SAFE - This compact and lightweight international power adapter is ideal for travelers, overseas business, work, and students. It does not have surge protection and can be conveniently used on a cruise ship as well. Built-in 10A fuse, safety shutters, separate plug lock system, RoHS, CE, and FCC certifications provide extra peace of mind.

TIPS - If you need more fuses, you can search for "Epicka 10A Replacement Fuses" on Amazon for purchasing. Please ensure that you're selecting Epicka's 10A fuses, as using fuses with incorrect specifications could lead to incompatibility with the product.
